resources.string: This is the splash screen which will play a sound file and display an image for 7 seconds before moving on to the next screen.

This screen will contain a quiz (or a shake animation mechanic) to (randomly) display which class you\'ve been placed into. An image of the Harry Potter sorting hat will be either a static image or background to this screen.
Clicking this button will submit your quiz (if chosen), calculate the quiz, and transitions to the next screen.
This screen will display an image of the class you\'ve been assigned to (if quiz is chosen), or after shake input will transition to this screen.
Clicking this button will change the screen to the patronus screen
